it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.actions

Class LsaAbstractAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.actions.AbstractAction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
      • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.actions.LsaAbstractAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>, ILsaAction, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LsaStandardAction, SAPEREAgent

    public abstract class LsaAbstractAction
extends AbstractAction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
implements ILsaAction
    See Also:

      • allocateVars

        protected List<IExpression> allocateVars(ILsaMolecule template)
        Given an LSA template, allocates all the variables using the current matches. The allocations may or not produce an instance: it does only if all the variable within the LSA have a corresponding entry in the matches map.
        Parameters:
        template - the LSA template
        Returns:
        the template with all the the variables instanced

      • allocateVarsAndBuildLSA

        protected ILsaMolecule allocateVarsAndBuildLSA(ILsaMolecule template)
        Same of allocateVars(ILsaMolecule), but also builds an ILsaMolecule.
        Parameters:
        template - the LSA template
        Returns:
        the template with all the the variables instanced

      • cloneOnNewNode

        public abstract LsaAbstractAction cloneOnNewNode(INode<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> n,
                                                 IReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> r)
        Description copied from interface: IAction
        This method allows to clone this action on a new node. It may result useful to support runtime creation of nodes with the same reaction programming, e.g. for morphogenesis.
        Specified by:
        cloneOnNewNode in interface IAction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
        Specified by:
        cloneOnNewNode in interface ILsaAction
        Parameters:
        n - The node where to clone this IAction
        r - The reaction to which the CURRENT action is assigned
        Returns:
        the cloned action

      • getLSAArgumentAsDouble

        protected Double getLSAArgumentAsDouble(ILsaMolecule mol,
                                        int argNumber)
        This method allows subclasses to access a field of an LSA (supposed to be a computable expression or a number) and have back its VALUE as Double. Hides some low-level details. If a molecule template is passed, it will be istanced using the current matches.
        Parameters:
        mol - the molecule (or molecule template)
        argNumber - the position of the argument
        Returns:
        the value as Double, or NaN if you use this method not properly

      • getLSAArgumentAsDouble

        protected Double getLSAArgumentAsDouble(List<IExpression> mol,
                                        int argNumber)
        This method allows subclasses to access a field of an LSA (supposed to be a computable expression or a number) and have back its VALUE as Double. Hides some low-level details. If a molecule template is passed, it will be instanced using the current matches.
        Parameters:
        mol - the molecule (or molecule template)
        argNumber - the position of the argument
        Returns:
        the value as Double, or NaN if you use this method not properly

      • getLSAs

        protected List<ILsaMolecule> getLSAs(ILsaNode n,
                                     ILsaMolecule template)
        Accesses an LSA space and retrieves a molecule matching template. It instances its variables with the current matches before accessing the space. Equivalent to getLSAs(n, template, true)
        Parameters:
        n - the node to access
        template - the template molecule to retrieve
        Returns:
        a list of ILsaMolecules matching the (possibly partly instanced) template

      • getLSAs

        protected List<ILsaMolecule> getLSAs(ILsaNode n,
                                     ILsaMolecule template,
                                     boolean useMatches)
        Accesses an LSA space and retrieves a molecule matching template. It can use the template as-is or instance its variables with the current matches before accessing the space.
        Parameters:
        n - the node to access
        template - the template molecule to retrieve
        useMatches - if true, the template will have its variables (possibly partly) instantiated using the values in the matches map
        Returns:
        a list of ILsaMolecules matching the (possibly partly instanced) template

      • getLSAsFromLocalSpace

        protected List<ILsaMolecule> getLSAsFromLocalSpace(ILsaMolecule template)
        Accesses the local tuple space and retrieves a molecule matching template. It instances its variables with the current matches before accessing the space. Equivalent to getLSAsFromLocalSpace(template, true)
        Parameters:
        template - the template molecule to retrieve
        Returns:
        a list of ILsaMolecules matching the (possibly partly instanced) template

      • getLSAsFromLocalSpace

        protected List<ILsaMolecule> getLSAsFromLocalSpace(ILsaMolecule template,
                                                   boolean useMatches)
        Accesses the local tuple space and retrieves a molecule matching template. It can use the template as-is or instance its variables with the current matches before accessing the space.
        Parameters:
        template - the template molecule to retrieve
        useMatches - if true, the template will have its variables (possibly partly) instantiated using the values in the matches map
        Returns:
        a list of ILsaMolecules matching the (possibly partly instanced) template

      • getMatchAsDouble

        protected double getMatchAsDouble(FasterString s)
        Given a variable, allows to access to its associated value as double. Note that this might fail if you try to access a value which is not numeric through this method.
        Parameters:
        s - the variable
        Returns:
        the double value associated to the variable

        Parameters:
        s - the variable
        Returns:
        the double value associated to the variable

      • getNodes

        protected final List<? extends ILsaNode> getNodes()
        Returns:

      • injectLocally

        protected void injectLocally(ILsaMolecule m)
        Injects an ILsaMolecule locally.
        Parameters:
        m - the molecule to inject. Must be instanced: no variables, no comparators, no operations of any kind.

      • setLSAArgument

        protected ILsaMolecule setLSAArgument(ILsaMolecule template,
                                      double data,
                                      int argNumber)
        Given an an LSA template, an argument number and some new data, sets the argument in the given position as the passed value.
        Parameters:
        template - the original LSA template
        data - the data to insert
        argNumber - the argument to substitute with the new one
        Returns:
        the template modified, with the insertion of data where required in place of the old value
